Hello World

This is the new documentation site for SubToMe. It will include general documentation for the publishers who implemented the button, the readers who are able to handle these subscriptions as well as news related to SubToMe: new releases, interesting implementations, goodies… etc.

Please, stay with us, Subscribe!
